records.summary: Large bright flood light over S.W. Las Vegas.  ((NUFORC Note:  U. S. Navy missile launch.  PD))
records.story: Large bright flood light over S.W. Las Vegas. ((NUFORC Note:  U. S. Navy missile launch.  PD)) We looked up over the western edge of the las vegas valley - above Bishop Gorman Highschool area - and saw what appeared to be a giant flood light in the sky - almost thought it was from a search and rescue helicopter but the light didn't move or flicker at all - it was SO BRIGHT. It illuminated approximately 100 feet of airspace in a fan shape but could not see it lighting up the ground at all.  The object/light very slowly made its way over the western mountains and then we could tell it was still on, because the mountains become backlight in the dark of night.

records.summary: Strange light formations over Vegas 10-18-15
records.story: Strange light formations over Vegas 10-18-15 I saw strange bright lights in the sky, even though it is rainy and overcast.  There were 9-11 rectangular shaped lights shaped in rows like a chimney, and one pointing in the top and the bottom.  I ran inside to get my husband, he saw them too and they changed into different sizes and shapes.  They looked like they were making constellation forms for a time.  They proceeded to disappear one by one, I asked my husband if he saw it and he said yes, although he couldn't explain it.

records.summary: Hovering red lights. Not any known Comercial aircraft landing lights or navagation lights.
records.story: Hovering red lights.  Not any known Commercial aircraft landing lights or navagation lights.

records.summary: 2 very large floating reddish orbs in the south eastern sky. They were not solid in color they appeared to be on fire however were perf
records.story: 2 very large floating reddish orbs in the south eastern sky.  They were not solid in color they appeared to be on fire however were perfectly round in shape.  They hovered for two minutes then floated off to the south very quickly till no longer visible

records.summary: We saw two star like objects moving ultra slow.  One made a slow sse to nnw pass and the other stayed virtually just to the south of us
records.story: We saw two star like objects moving ultra slow.  One made a slow sse to nnw pass and the other stayed virtually just to the south of us with small minor movements of the last two hours.  They didn't change in intensity but looked like the international space station minus the velocity.  Now it's gone!

records.summary: 3 friends and I were sitting and talking on the outside patio of McMullan's Irish Pub, which faces east and looks out at the Orleans Ho
records.story: 3 Friends and I were sitting and talking on the outside patio of McMullan's Irish Pub, which faces east and looks out at the Orleans Hotel and Casino.  We were witness to a Triangular boomerang shaped object that hovered over the very top platform of the Orleans Hotel and Casino at 10:15pm or 22:15 for approximately 10 minutes.  It appeared solid white in color as it reflected the lights from the top of the casino, yet it didnt appear to be illuminated itself.  From where we were and the city noises around us, it did not make any identifiable sounds.  At first I thought it was either a remote controlled drone or large nocturnal  bird, but then after sizing it up against the surroundings, it had to have been around the size of a car.  It also didn't move like a bird,  but more like a object being controlled because its amazing maneuvering abilities such as hovered completely still for a long period of time (the full 10 minutes), tilting completely vertically for a! minute and then it shot off toward the south with speed that seemed as if it just vanished into thin air.   My friends were not as interested in the object as I was and looked away after a few minutes, missing the object taking off from its hovering position.  I wanted to report it to see if anyone else in the area witnessed this object or if maybe this was a drone of some sort.  Thank you.

records.summary: Bright white light with glowing tail.  ((NUFORC Note:  We suspect a rocket launch.  PD))
records.story: Bright white light with glowing tail ((NUFORC Note:  US Navy missile launch.  PD)) The sighting happened on Saturday, November 7th at 6:03pm in Las Vegas, NV.  My husband and I were driving south on Martin Luther King Blvd., and we had just past Carey when I looked to the right and saw a bright white light to the west.  The light was not moving and the sky to the left of the light was illuminated.  The light to the left looked like a tail and was glowing, like a cloud or fog. By the time mu husband could pull over the light had dimmed and I could not get a good picture with my cell phone.  I know that we are not the only people who saw the light, as it was visible in Arizona and California as reported by Fox 5 News.  Here is the link to the news report that says it could have been a missile test by the Navy in San Diego.  I honestly do not believe this is the same light we saw as it did not move. http://www.fox5vegas.com/story/30464112/light-seen-in-las-vegas-sky-result-of-missile-test-in-pacific

records.summary: Stationary lights, spinning, then horizontal and vertical movement.
records.story: Stationary lights, spinning, then horizontal and vertical movement. 3 people witness what first appeared to be a plane stationary in the sky.  Looking closer and trying to make it out.  It had Stationary red and white light with a flashing green light.   After a about 2 minutes, it rotated counter clockwise, then all lights went bright red, it moved slowly to the right, then back to the left, then dropped straight down at high speed.  Immediately after it dropped out of sight, there were two helicopters circling the area with search lights.

records.summary: Bright white light in the sky over the west side of Las Vegas
records.story: Bright white light in the sky over the west side of Las Vegas I was talking with a friend and there was nothing in the sky to the west.  I know because I was looking in that direction anyways.  I put my head down to rub my eye and when I looked up there was this white bright light in the sky.  It turned several times very abruptly and then shot down as if to the surface and then the light just when out.   There was no sound from the object.   Very weird!!!!

records.summary: Leaving a friend's house in N. Las Vegas a very bright round orange/red light was moving across the sky. It was not very high. Then w
records.story: Leaving a friend's house in North Las Vegas, a very bright round orange/red light was moving across the sky.  It was not very high.  Then went out of sight.   We grabbed binoculars and looked at the object.  This was nothing we have ever seen before.

records.summary: Multiple white lights above the mountain ridge and traversing the mountain.
records.story: Multiple white lights above the mountain ridge and traversing the mountain On 9/27/15 my wife and I were trying to watch the blood moon forming in the east.  Since it was very cloudy throughout most of the valley, I became a little bored and started to look around the sky.  Upon looking at the mountain behind our house I noticed a couple white dots hovering over the mountain.  I thought they were airplanes at first because that is a normal route that is used when they are coming in to land at McCarran Airport.  After a few minutes went by they still had not moved any closer and stayed in the same area.  I then noticed more lights appearing next to them, there were approximately 6-8 more lights that appeared right next to each other.  I was able to see the lights moving around from left to right and a few of them would disappear then reappear for the next few minutes.  After another minute went by we had seen more lights appear closer to us, but still over the mountain.  As this was happening we noticed what appeared to be lights comi! ng down the side of the mountain.  There were probably at least 30 objects moving down alongside the mountain.  As this was happening my wife started to freak out and pulled me inside of the house.  She started to have a panic attack so I had to tend to her for the rest of the night.  Where we viewed the objects moving down the mountain I did not know that there was trail that high up.  I had found this out the next day using google earth and verified that these lights were moving down that same trail.  We live approximately 300 ft. away from the mountain and will normally hear vehicles or off-road vehicles driving on the road below the trail.  There was no sound at all and the lights appeared to be hovering over the ground.  I also thought that they may have been people walking/running on the trail, but that didn’t explain the lights hover above the mountain.  All of the lights seen were large and very bright; they were definitely bigger than a flashlight and probably bigger! than the size of a headlight.  They were definitely not flares or any other type of aircraft,   I was in the military and I know how planes and flares move.  The mountain I am referencing is called “Desert Hills” right in the corner of Blue Diamond Rd.  and Fort Apache Rd.

records.summary: On 9/4/15, I seen 2 pill/cylinder shaped objects in the sky they had no wings and no lights and were really white. I was waiting for my
records.story: On 9/4/15, I seen 2 pill/cylinder shaped objects in the sky they had no wings and no lights and were really white.  I was waiting for my fiancee to return from the store to show her as I waited in the parking lot but by then it was too late they flew into the clouds, but I kept looking up and suddenly I seen only one heading in the opposite direction as if one made a 90 degree angle turn to the left in the clouds and that's the one that I showed my fiancee.

records.summary: Was driving towards the freeway in nw Las Vegas, looked out my window and saw a long rectangle light flying horizontal.
records.story: Was driving towards the freeway in nw Las Vegas, looked out my window and saw a long rectangle light flying horizontal...I tried to take pics buy it disappeared into the clouds...there also appeared to be a second similar craft farther away.   Less than a minute later, I saw 2 normal airplanes so I know what I saw wasn't my mind distorting the image

records.summary: Strange Light pulsating red, blue, green
records.story: Strange Light pulsating red, blue, green   Me and the Husband went out to smoke and noticed that the stars were pretty visible tonight In Las Vegas.  Looked up southeastern early morning sky to notice a bright star that was pulsating or twinkling much faster than then those around it.   It was alone in the sky, pulsating between red, blue, and green shades of light milliseconds apart.   Grabbed the Camera with 55-250mm lens and took some shots and few seconds of video.

records.summary: V-shaped object flying without lights and no sound.
records.story: V-shaped object flying without lights and no sound. We were out in the pool last night about 9:45pm.  We go in the pool at this time probably 5 to 6 times a week.  We float around in the pool and look at the sky and stars.  A few weeks ago we saw a meteor.  Usually some planes from Nellis Air Force Base, and some planes heading to the Las Vegas airport,  or planes very high up flying to some other area. Last night, I looked and was stunned because this V-shaped object was flying north to south.  There was no sound and no lights.   All the planes we have seen have always had lights on them.  It seemed light colored, and I think I only saw it because the moon was kinda bright and seemed to reflect some light off the object. As soon as I realized this object seemed strange,  I called to my roommate to look where I was looking.  He also saw it, before our view was blocked by my neighbor's tree.  He agreed it was very odd, and didn't have any lights on. It seemed pretty large and was moving at a good speed.  It was going in a straight line. We were both stunned by what we saw, because we have never seen anything like this object before, and we are in the pool at night 5 or 6 times a week since late April.

records.summary: Impossibly fast moving object near McCarran Airport.
records.story: Impossibly fast moving object near McCarran Airport I was traveling westbound on I-215 around warm springs exit.  I spotted small diamond shaped object westbound at about 500 feet.   I thought it may be a drone, however it accelerated and climbed at a tremendous rate until it reached high clouds about 10 miles away in the foothills, it did this in a few seconds.   Being close to McCarran airport, they might have picked something up on their radar.   The object left no trail.

records.summary: Was out in front of the house and I looked up and I seen this bright white egg like shape going though the clouds and it was going at a
records.story: Was out in front of the house and I looked up and I seen this bright white egg like shape going though the clouds and it was going at a good amount of speed.

records.summary: Triangle shaped craft over Nevada Highway plus other red light craft
records.story: Triangle shaped craft over Nevada Highway plus other red light craft First of all, we have never officially reported this sighting to anyone before.  We just told friends and family who all looked at us with scepticism.  After watching a UFO special where the reports on objects seen were very similar I decided to write a report. We are Australians.  (My husband and I and a close friend.)  We were traveling by RV from Oregon to Las Vegas in October 2008.  On the day in question, we were driving from Mono Lake to Vegas and cut across to Highway 95.  On the way to 95 we blew a tyre which had to be changed.  This delayed us so by the time we got to highway 95 it was getting dark.  We stopped for gas then continued south. The map showed a large military base to the east of the highway.  I joked with the others saying 'wouldn't it be fun if we saw a UFO around here?'.  In all our USA travels over 20 years, we'd never seen a UFO before.  We laughed about it and kept going south.  It had become completely dark and I estimate it was around 7 or 8pm. My husband was driving the A class RV (bus style front with huge windscreen).  We were going fairly slow enjoying the drive - normal amount of traffic.  I was in navigator seat and our friend was behind on the couch.  My husband who is quite observant, was looking out the window and at the stars as we drove.  It was a clear night and stars were clearly visible. A few minutes later he slowed right down.  He was looking up through the windscreen and said 'the stars have all disappeared.  Do you see that above us?'.  I looked up and our friend looked out the side window.  We all saw that the stars were no longer visible.  We pulled over to the side of the road and stopped.  By this time we could see that there was a large black object over the top of the RV that was blocking the stars.  We were all saying, 'What is that?' to each other. As soon as we stopped, our friend opened the door and we all got out of the RV. We then looked up and got a better idea what was above us.  It was a large, gun metal black triangular craft. It was moving very slowly, almost hovering over us.  It was huge - we estimated about the size of a football field.  We could only make out how big it was by the far corners as they had small blinking lights.  The lights are what made my husband think the craft was man made rather then extra-terrestrial. Also there was absolutely no noise coming from the craft.  No engine noise at all. Our friend went around to the back of our RV and climbed the ladder to stand on top of the RV to get a closer look.  It was really low - perhaps only 30 feet up.  It was over us for a few minutes then it kept drifting slowly east and gradually got faster.  Then, it got instant speed (like something you'd see on Star Trek's warp drive) and instantly flew out and over the horizon. In the distance were some hills (where the military base was marked on the map).  Once the craft disappeared we could see flashes of light coming from behind the hills kind of like lightning or weapon explosions.  These continued for a while. As we were discussing what we'd seen, three other objects started flying around.  Marked by three red lights, the three objects flew in formation together.  They moved in angular motion - angles, up and down, round, back and forward and zig zag.  They didn't fly like any normal craft you would recognise.  Again, they didn't seem to make any sound but they were further away than the first ship had been.  Really all we could see of them were three bright red lights - each light a separate object.  We watched them for about half an hour amazed at what we were seeing.  Eventually they seemed to leave the area.  As time was moving on we got back into the RV and took off slowly down the road still watching the sky. A short while later the three craft / red lights reappeared.  We stopped again, got out and watched them.  They did the same kind of manouvers as the first time. All in all, they disappeared and came back again about 4 times in total.  This all took place over the space of about 2.5 hours and over a distance of less than ten miles (that we travelled).  Then, the last time we saw the three lights/synchronized craft) they seemed to drop regular red coloured flares which went to the ground.  They then left the area.  A few minutes later two regular military jet aircraft flew over the area and into the distance over the hills.  Then nothing further happened. Amazed we eventually got going again and drove the rest of the way to Vegas, getting in around 11pm.  We sat up most of the night discussing and dissecting everything we'd seen just to make sure none of us were crazy!  We ended up assuming they were some kind of craft owned by the military but they were certainly nothing like anything we'd ever seen.  My husband worked in the Australian defense department in Canberra for years and had seen classified aircraft over the years but nothing like this.  Our friend who was with us is a computer/electric vehicle expert but still had never seen anything like these craft or the way they operated. I was surprised that nobody else stopped on the highway or seemed to see them.  I guess most people are busy and in their little world unlike us who were moving slow and observant whilst on our holiday.  So I hope you find this report of interest.  I've tried to explain it all as logically as I could.   P.S.--We had no video camera with us.  Our friend tried to take photos of the black craft but being black on a black sky in the dark, none came out so we have no photographic evidence.  Even though this happened a few years ago now, it's very fresh in all our minds.   It was an incredible experience.

records.summary: Driving down Decatur Sahara. Right in front of my driving view I notice a blue and orange flying fireball. Coming from Charleston towar
records.story: Driving down Decatur Sahara.  Right in front of my driving view, I notice a blue and orange flying fireball.  Coming from Charleston towards desert inn.   Was going fast couldn't use my camera it was gone.   No sound and was not flying up or down just straight across the sky.   At 5:56 has anyone else seen the same object? ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  Time may be p.m., but we have no way to confirm that fact.  PD))

records.summary: Blinking red, green and blue lights.  ((NUFORC Note:  Possibly a "twinkling" star??  PD))
records.story: blinking red, green and blue lights I went outside to smoke a cigarette, when I seen blinking lights that stood still then the lights moved up in the sky then back down then across the sky then landed behind the mountains, and there was no sound.   I caught the blinking lights on video and I also sent a picture to your director. ((NUFORC Note:  Possibly a "twinkling" star??  PD))

records.summary: Object was seen as a bright cigar-shaped obj.  ((NUFORC Note:  Re-entering space debris.  PD))
records.story: This object was seen as a bright cigar shaped object, traveling slowly with a light tail that was just as bright.  the front of the object was much brighter than the rest.   After about 45 seconds the object broke up into smaller fragments with tails aswell.   Object appeared to be falling. ((NUFORC Note:  Re-entering space debris.  PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Flaming red cigar shaped with white and yellowish tail streaking across the sky.  ((NUFORC Note:  Re-entering space debris.  PD))
records.story: flaming red cigar shaped with white and yellowish tail streaking across the sky very fast. We saw a flaming cigar shaped meteorite coming across the sky from west to east while we were driving in our car. ((NUFORC Note:  Re-entering space debris.  PD))

records.summary: Low Comet Stream with 3 Tails.  ((NUFORC Note:  Re-entering satellite debris.  PD))
records.story: Low Comet Stream with 3 Tails Was driving and barely caught sight of what I (think) is a comet but never seen this low or for duration center valley.   Captured at 6:09PM, 33 seconds of what seemed occurring for at least a minute, there was enough time for me to fumble for my video camera.  There were 3 lights that were tiered that seemed moving yet stationary at the same time.   As soon as I was able to pull into the median to capture it better, the lights faded instantly in the air.   Helicopter's were flying into air space within moments but I have no clue further. ((NUFORC Note:  Re-entering satellite debris.  PD))

records.summary: A fireball across Las Vegas Valley.  ((NUFORC Note:  Re-entering space debris.  PD))
records.story: a fireball across Las Vegas valley. A large fireball flying across the Las Vegas Nevada sky from the northwest sky toward the southwest. It appeared to be breaking up. Reminded me of the space shuttle when it broke up. ((NUFORC Note:  Re-entering space debris.  PD))

records.summary: Driving on 95S, saw a triangle with an inverted bottom, outlined in chasing white lights. ((NUFORC Note:  Former law enforcement.  PD))
records.story: While driving on 95S, i saw a triangle with an inverted bottom, outlined in chasing white lights hovering/bobbing above Santa Fe casino I live in the Centennial Hills area of Las Vegas, NV.  This is the northwest. I was traveling to work southbound on the 95 freeway.  I was late for work.  I always watch the skies.  I don’t know why, it's not like I ever see anything.  On 1/5/2016 between the hours of 9:25pm and 9:45pm, I actually did.  As I passed the Santa Fe Casino, on my left, right above the casino I witnessed a triangular V-shaped object over the casino.  I cannot remember if it was over the parking garage area or closer to the casino part.  I am not sure.  What I am sure of, however, is that I was seeing a V-shaped aerial object.     The object that I saw was "hovering" in the air, as low as a helicopter could fly.  (I have had airplanes fly by or helicopters sit idle near me and I hear a sound)  This object was  emitting absolutely NO sound. It was close enough for me to hear a sound.  I would have heard a sound.  Were this a helicopter or an airplane, I'm sure I would have heard sound.  I thought maybe it was some type of military stealth flying object.  But why would it be just hovering Non-stealthily over the nasty old Santa Fe Casino?  Also I saw lights.  I cannot say for sure what other colors I saw besides white.  White was the dominant color, I do know that for sure.  There could have been other colors as well.  What I can say for absolute assurity is that the lights were chasing.  Chasing like those Christmas lights that people have.  The lights were chasing in the shape of the object that I was seeing, which was a V shape (acute triangle) two long sides with a shorter bottom.  The bottom was invert! ed to another v.      As I was seeing this, my psyche attempted to explain away my optical.  The reason I was unsuccessful at explaining this away, was because of the motion of the object.  As it hovered in that spot, it rotated at a half circle as it bobbed up and down slightly, while slightly tilted to the right.  The movement of the craft, the location of the craft and the fact that I could hear no sound from a craft that was in such close proximity to my vehicle are the reasons why I am writing this report.  The behavior of the craft frightened me more than the sight of it.  I felt an immediate fear mixed with excitement mixed with dread mixed with sadness.  A combination of feelings that I have never felt.     Please be advised that I was driving when I witnessed this.  I pulled to the carpool lane and started to drive very slowly to ensure that I was seeing what I was seeing.  I started to swerve cause I was looking at the object instead of looking at the road.  I turned away to keep from getting pulled over for a traffic violation.  I was afraid to stop and pull over. This happened to me.  I do not have any history of mental illness.  I have never made a report of something like this before.  I believe in the existence of something other than human beings for several reasons that I will not go into, because that is not what this report is for.   I just want whoever this gets to, to  take my accounts seriously.  I am a previous member of law enforcement.  I have had to listen to reports like this frequently from crazy people.  I know the difference.  I hope you do too.  I know what I saw.  I just would like someone to tell me why I saw it.

records.summary: Very bright red light hovering over western residential area of Las Vegas for a short time.
records.story: Very bright red light hovering over western residential area of Las Vegas for a short time. A very bright round red light was hovering high over the residential area west of the strip moving very slowly and stopping in place, then suddenly disappeared.  Was quite high up but appeared very large and much brighter than a drone would be. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Green blinking light in the sky.
records.story: Green blinking light in the sky I was walking back to my apartment near summerlin with my boyfriend from a movie at 2:20am and I looked up at the sky ahead and saw a green light that looked like a big star.  The light was hovering high in the sky and then started moving erratically from right to left. It then shot up in the sky and hovered again but this time started blinking rapidly for a couple seconds and then would stop.  The light then would disappear only for a moment and started glowing green again.  My boyfriend also witnessed the light and could not explain what it was. I then saw it rapidly descend below the trees and houses.  I stayed outside for a few more minutes to see if anything came back but nothing happened after that.

records.summary: My wife and I witnessed 3 bright red objects that rose one behind the other shortly after midnight.
records.story: My wife and I witnessed 3 bright red objects that rose one behind the other shortly after midnight. Some of them seemed to dim slightly as they rose directly above our heads and then reappeared.  They traveled overhead and quickly disappeared in the horizon.   Then we saw 3 more rise from the same location, one behind each other in the sky and again travel overhead and disappeared in about 10 minutes.   These lights were very easy to see and a bright red color.

records.summary: Red orbs after the New Year's eve celebration.  Flying over the Las Vegas Valley.
records.story: Red orbs after the New Year's eve celebration.  Flying over the Las Vegas Valley. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Brief brilliant flash of light in the SW sky in Vegas.  Like a light burning out.
records.story: Brief brilliant flash of light in the SW sky in Vegas.  Like a light burning out.

records.summary: Flying north to south, one light formation blinking right to left, moving at very fast speed and succeeded by second light formation in
records.story: Flying north to south, one light formation blinking right to left, moving at very fast speed and succeeded by second light formation in same direction.   About three minutes later, a helicopter was seen following the flight path of lights.

Vanished into thin air. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: light lightspeed vanished.  ((anonymous report))
records.story: light lightspeed vanished I was smoking outside and was looking at the stars and thought i saw a laser in the sky, but when i looked at it, it was a really bright light nothing like i have ever seen before moving slowly to the right and then zipped away leaving a light trail and then the light trail disappeared a second after. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Round, white, non-blinking light traveling from the SW to the NW.
records.story: Round, white, non-blinking light traveling from the South West to the North West. I was sitting out side watching airplanes take off and land.  I live near the airport.  I noticed a round, single, white light that looked like a star at first, and was moving faster than the speed of an airplane.  It was traveling from the South West to the North West.  It had no flashing lights, and was definitely not a meteorite, plane, balloon, or helicopter.  I know how to recognize aircraft. At one point, it suddenly became much brighter for a couple of seconds, then dimmed again.  It continued to travel at the same speed toward the North West for another 30 seconds or so, then suddenly disappeared. ((NUFORC Note:  Object could not have been the International Space Station, which was not visible from Las Vegas at the time and date indicated by the witness.  PD))

records.summary: Large fireball with long tail traveling north to south s.e. of Vegas.  ((NUFORC Note:  Reported to have been a meteor.  PD))
records.story: Large fireball with long tail traveling north to south s.e. of Vegas Did anyone else see a huge fireball with a long tail s.e. of vegas? ((NUFORC Note:  Object reported by the news as a probable meteor.  We agree.  See photos of smoky trail left high in the sky above Arizona.  PD))

records.summary: Spaceship like something we could make soon, very basic
records.story: spaceship like something we could make soon, very basic looking up at the sky just relaxing by the pool in a lawn chair saw something moving oddly. it kinda looked like it was hiccuping moving in quick short jolts, then turned directions randomly. was way higher than any plane.  suddenly after about 2 min of watching 2 glowing edges showed up about 4 times the size of the original light i was watching.  that stopped after about 2 min and again just hiccuped around like it was before.  for about 45 min just kind of moving all over the place at the same speeds as before. light got brighter a couple of times,  none of those lines though then suddenly from the dot lights extended from the sides and the same lights i saw before. at this point i believe these were thrusters rocket like on jet and it was leaving the atmosphere here. why im saying that is it had many issues getting out and bouncing rapidly as if it was using everything it had to get into space. after about 5 min it stopped and turned back into a dot.  then 5 ! min later it lit up all the thrusters again.  still having issues bouncing around but was defiantly getting higher and seemed to finally get into orbit. same lights did show up every 5 min and got smaller and smaller till i could barley see it just a tiny dot going away.  it had to have been huge considering to see the thrusters from that distance.  ironically i heard jets suddenly in the distance towards the end from nelis air force base im guessing.  was way to late for them if thats what that was about. i have seen other things in the sky 3 other times in my life but nothing like this. this is the most interesting one to me because it wasnt as fast as anything else i have seen before and with the issues it seemed to have to leave earth it seemed like it was new to doing this.  it was to far to catch on my camera.  somewhere i have cough saucers in the middle of the day in las vegas about 6 years ago even got all the neighbors out and everybody saw what i saw so i know i was not out of my mind. again just excited i did see what i saw and could pass a lie detector  test if asked about this or any other things i have seen. this one is just blowing my mind. it was amazing

records.summary: I was outside with my dog I always look up in the sky at night I saw what looked like a planet size but it was blue,i kept looking  at
records.story: I was outside with my dog I always look up in the sky at night I saw what looked like a planet size but it was blue, i kept looking  at it it  got bigger than a planet it doubled in size then it veered to the right, then back to its to the spot was in and then it got smaller and smaller and disappeared completely it happens in 30 seconds or less.  las vegas, Nevada 05/04/16 at 9pm. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Triangle shaped object hovering in sky colors red, white, green and blue with a tail. 10 minutes hovered before moving slowly
records.story: Triangle shaped object hovering in sky colors red, white, green and blue with a tail.  10 minutes hovered before moving slowly On patio of house, very clear night counted 6 stars in the sky one object in the sky.  Triangle shaped object with a tail turning various colors, red, white, blue and green.  Object just hovered in the sky for around 10 minutes and then slowly moved westbound towards the mountains.  It was not a helicopter or plane these objects cannot stand still in the air..

records.summary: Dancing orbs.
records.story: Dancing ords Hey there, I was sitting on a bus bench at the a bus terminal waiting for my bus to go home, I decided to have a little snack and as I was opening it I seen from side of my glasses a ball of light over a building.  Naturally I thought I was a lamp or post on top of the building and didn't pay any attention to it.  Still waiting for my bus I stared at the light,dazing off and notice there comes another ball of light.  Didn't think much because the bus stop is near a airport and helicopter pad, but then I notice that the way it move could not have been either since it was moving in a wired motion.  Soon one orb got bright then the other and then the other dies out.  Then 2 more showed up and the one that Burt out showed itself again.  I watched for 15 minutes straight watching.  At first they made a line and then kind of broke off.  After then I didn't see them anymore.
